text: @jdawsey1 That’s absolutely impossible because I saw her tweet where she applauded Trumps amazing life saving heroics that have saved many a life & property from this Dem hoax virus. No way another go getter who likes to visit Mar-A-Larceny is worrying about contracting #coronavirus.
